slides.title: Healing Your Inner Child
slides.description: Discover the power of reconnecting with your younger self through gentle healing practices and self-compassion exercises.

slides.title: Recognize Your Wounds
slides.description: Identify the emotional patterns and triggers that stem from childhood experiences. Awareness is the first step toward healing.

slides.title: Practice Self-Compassion
slides.description: Treat yourself with the same kindness you would offer a hurting child. Your inner child deserves love and understanding.

slides.title: Create Safe Spaces
slides.description: Build environments and relationships that nurture your inner child's need for safety, acceptance, and unconditional love.

slides.title: Embrace Your Authentic Self
slides.description: Allow your true personality to shine through. Your inner child knows who you really are beneath the protective layers.
